name: Too High
description:
Too High is a game made during the Game Jam+ in about 48 hours

3 themes were available, we could choose between them or mix them... We choose the second option

The themes were : Unexpected - Medicinal - Playable with one hand

Too High is about drugs and their "possible" effects on our perception. With them, we can think that something is incredible, while it's just not much

We tried to accentuate on the transition from one world to another

Team :

Game Design : Stanislas Vaslin -  Tom Rivaud - Maxime Veyriat

Level Design & Effects : Stanislas Vaslin

Prog : Tom Rivaud

2D : Maxime Veyriat

WARNING : Too High contains flashing images, don't play it if you are epileptic

WARNING 2 : The game was made for AZERTY keyboard, here's the controls for QWERTY

A-D : Left - Right (switch to D-A when warning sign spawn)

W : Jump (switch to S when Z crossed)
